meanings.definition: Better, greater, or otherwise different from what is usual.
meanings.sent1: The cake was very special because it had extra frosting.
meanings.sent2: She felt special when she received a handmade card from her friend.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was special when it caught a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in special hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The special toy was the most popular item at the store.

meanings.definition: A product or service offered at a reduced price or with added features for a limited time.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant had delicious specials on the menu.
meanings.sent2: She always checked the specials board before ordering.
meanings.sent3: The specials at the grocery store made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The hotel offered specials for guests staying over the weekend.
meanings.sent5: The specials flyer advertised discounts on various items.

meanings.definition: A television or radio program that is not part of a regular series.
meanings.sent1: They decided to watch a special about animals on TV.
meanings.sent2: The radio station announced a special broadcast for the holiday.
meanings.sent3: The special on cooking made her hungry for a snack.
meanings.sent4: The special on space exploration fascinated the students.
meanings.sent5: The TV guide highlighted the upcoming specials for the week.
